turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I was wondering if you could help me order three pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing, how many did you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need three large pizzas, all of them with extra cheese. And as far as toppings go, I need two of them with pepperoni and jalapenos. And the other one is just going to be a plain cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, that's 3 large pizzas, two pepperoni and jalapenos, one plain cheese, each with extra cheese for a total of $48.99.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It sounds good to me. Can you make it a pickup order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your order will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes, and you'll get the receipt via text!
